Class MinMaxBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephengware.java.games.mm_game.ai.MinMaxBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bot

    public class MinMaxBot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Bot
    This bot expands the entire game tree and makes its decision based on Min Max search.
    Author:
    Stephen G. Ware

      • findMax

        private double findMax(GameTree tree)
        Given a GameTree node, expand its children (if any) to find the node with the highest minimum utility value.

        tree - the node whose children need to be expanded
        Returns:
        the utility value of the node with the highest minimum utility

      • findMin

        private double findMin(GameTree tree)
        Given a GameTree node, expand its children (if any) to find the node with the lowest maximum utility value.
        Parameters:
        tree - the node whose children need to be expanded
        Returns:
        the utility value of the node with the lowest maximum utility
